casebody.data:
CHRISTOPHER
v.
COBBLESTONE HOA OF CLAYTON, INC. 375A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 13, 2016

J. Matthew Waters, Attorney at Law, Hope Derby Carmichael, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Cobblestone Homeowners Association of Clayton, Inc.

Robert A. Spence, Jr., Attorney at Law, Smithfield, For Christopher, Frank.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of October 2016 by Defendant to Consolidate Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of October 2016."
